meta.name: CarbonS Design System — Layout Patterns
meta.description: Responsive layout patterns for the CarbonS management SaaS. Mobile-first, generous whitespace.

dashboardShell.description: Primary application layout — sidebar + topbar + content area.
dashboardShell.css: display: grid; grid-template-columns: var(--sidebar-width) 1fr; grid-template-rows: var(--topbar-height) 1fr;

metricsGrid.description: KPI cards in responsive grid. 1→2→3→4 columns.
metricsGrid.css: display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(280px, 1fr)); gap: var(--cs-space-6);

contentWithAside.description: Main content area with optional sidebar details panel.

formLayout.description: Form field arrangement — stacked on mobile, 2-column on desktop.

responsive.mobile: single column, full width fields, gap 20px
responsive.desktop: 2 columns for short fields, full width for textareas, gap 24px

responsive.mobile: list view only, tap to navigate to detail page
responsive.desktop: split view: list (320px fixed) + detail (fill), resizable

dataTable.description: Table with filter bar pattern for data-heavy views.

responsive.mobile: card view (each row becomes a card), filter in drawer
responsive.tablet: horizontal scroll table, sticky first column
responsive.desktop: full table, inline filter bar above, pagination below

structure.filterBar: above table, horizontal row of filter chips + search + action button
structure.table: full width, alternating row backgrounds optional
structure.pagination: below table, right-aligned, showing range + page controls
structure.bulkActions: sticky bottom bar when rows selected

settingsPage.description: Vertical navigation + form content for settings/preferences.

responsive.mobile: accordion sections, all collapsed by default
responsive.tablet: tab navigation at top, content below
responsive.desktop: left nav (200px) + content area, sticky nav

emptyCanvas.description: Full-page empty state for first-time or empty views.

specs.verticalPosition: 40% from top (slightly above center for visual comfort)

responsive.desktop: split layout: left panel (brand/illustration, 50%) + right panel (form, 50%)

sectionSpacing.description: Vertical rhythm between major page sections.
